teacheasy.runtime

Class RunTimeData

  • java.lang.Object
    • teacheasy.runtime.RunTimeData

  • public class RunTimeData
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates the current state of an instance of the Learn Easy application and all its data. The methods in this class are called when events occur in the top level class which incorporates the GUI.
    Version:
    2.0 28 May 2015
    Author:
    Alistair Jewers, Daniel Berhe

    • Nested Class Summary

      A handler for the hyper link actions

      • RunTimeData

        public RunTimeData(javafx.scene.Group nGroup,
           javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D nBounds,
           LearnEasyClient nParent)
        Constructor method for the run time data in standard mode.
        Parameters:
        nGroup - The group that lesson content is drawn on.
        nBounds - A rectangle describing the groups size.
        nParent - The parent client.

      • RunTimeData

        public RunTimeData(javafx.scene.Group nGroup,
           javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D nBounds,
           PreviewWindow nPreviewParent,
           Lesson nLesson)
        Alternative constructor for the run time data in preview mode from within the Teach Easy application.
        Parameters:
        nGroup - The group that lesson content is drawn on.
        nBounds - A rectangle describing the groups size.
        nPreviewParent - The preview window that instantiates this instance of the run time data.
        nLesson - The lesson object to load in preview mode.

    • Method Detail

      • setup

        public void setup(javafx.scene.Group nGroup,
         javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D nBounds,
         LearnEasyClient nParent,
         boolean nPreviewMode)
        Sets up the run time data when it is first instantiated. Operation varies based on mode.
        Parameters:
        nGroup - The group on which to draw pages.
        nBounds - A rectangle describing the size of the drawing area.
        nParent - The learn easy client that instantiates this run time data.
        nPreviewMode - Indicates whether this is a preview mode run.
